column1: Art Institute of Chicago////I was so excited to come here
column2: but left disappointed. First of all
column3: we had to check in all our items and with a cost as well. Most of the museums I've been to let us just turn our backpacks to the front of our bodies and if we did have to check anything in
column4: it was free. I understand that they want to preserve all their art
column5: but at least be friendly about it. Everyone was so rude.
